title: After the Dance
description: Fort Worth, Texas, investigators desperately search for answers after a 17-year-old high school student is kidnapped and murdered following a Valentine’s Day dance. Josh Mankiewicz reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
